<template>
  <form class="homepage" @submit.prevent="handleSubmit">
    <label>Username</label>
    <input type="text" v-model="username" placeholder="enter mail">
    
    <label>Password</label>
    <input type="password" v-model="password" placeholder="enter password">
    
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-success shadow-lg">Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'HomePageComponent',
  data() {
    return {
      username: '',
      password: ''
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleSubmit() {
      // Handle form submission
      console.log('Username:', this.username);
      console.log('Password:', this.password);
      
      // Example: Navigate or perform any other action
      this.navigateTo('Submit');
    },
    navigateTo(page) {
      // Implement navigation logic here
      console.log('Navigating to:', page);
      // For example, you might use Vue Router to navigate
      // this.$router.push({ name: page });
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
@import '~bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css';

.homepage {
  margin-top: 150px;
}

label {
  margin-top: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  text-align: center;
  color: #555;
  font-weight: bold;
}

input {
  width: 30%; /* Adjust width to be more practical */
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  padding: 10px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border: 1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius: 5px;
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

button {
  margin-top: 1%;
}
</style>
